header.tagline: Your Coordinator for International Medical Treatment

footer.tagline: Your trusted partner for organizing treatment abroad.

about.title: About Me
about.story: I am Dr. Angelina Zamorska, a medical coordinator originally from Ukraine. I studied medicine in Poland, lived for some time in Germany, and regularly visited our partner clinics in Turkey. For the last three years, I have been working as a medical coordinator, helping patients find the right treatment abroad. Being a doctor myself, I understand both the medical details and the emotional challenges. My mission is to make sure you receive the best possible care with full trust and transparency.
